title: Rav Shabtai Levi's Halachic Clarification
body: Rav Shabtai Levi, Rav of Ramat Aharon, issued a halachic clarification on a special bracha for today's massive atzeres in Yerushalayim protesting draft decrees against yeshiva students.

title: Rabbi Yechiel Aharon Boimel Passes
body: Revered Slonimer chassid Reb Yechiel Aharon Boimel zt”l, 92, passed away. Levayah in Yerushalayim today.

title: Million Man Atzeres Tefillah
body: WATCH LIVE: A massive Million Man Atzeres Tefillah is taking place in Yerushalayim, with thousands gathering for a day of prayer and unity. The event, known as "Zaakas HaTorah," aims to bring together men from around the world to strengthen their connection to Torah and community.

title: Likud MK Praises Torah Learners
body: Likud MK Galit Distel-Atbaryan praised Torah learners, calling them the "soul of the Jewish people" and expressing frustration with the campaign against the chareidi community, saying those who align with the left will be left alone.
